rocktopus_mini.name: Mini Rocktopus
rocktopus_mini.desc: This one is immature, but no less fierce.

rocktopus_fresh.name: Fresh Rocktopus
rocktopus_fresh.desc: Not very powerful, but certainly fresh.

rocktopus_blooming.name: Blooming Rocktopus
rocktopus_blooming.desc: Being in full bloom doesn't make it any less dangerous.

rocktopus_sour.name: Sour Rocktopus
rocktopus_sour.desc: It wants to let you know that it's not tasty.

rocktopus_ripe.name: Ripe Rocktopus
rocktopus_ripe.desc: Ready to eat or be eaten by.

rocktopus_spicy.name: Sour Rocktopus
rocktopus_spicy.desc: Hardly a healthy amount of spice. But that just makes it more delicious.

rocktopus_spoiled.name: Spoiled Rocktopus
rocktopus_spoiled.desc: Way past the stage where it should've been eaten, but somehow keeps growing anyway.

rocktopus_putrid.name: Putrid Rocktopus
rocktopus_putrid.desc: This thing is mutating beyond its mortal limits. It's too late to stop it now...
